message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000.  I know it's worth a lot to you, and I'm confident this is a fair price for both of us. Let me know what you think!

I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget. Can we meet in the middle at $10,000?

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $9,000 is a bit lower than I'd hoped, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,000? That's a good deal for both of us, and it would allow me to keep the product moving without losing too much.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,500, but I'm not sure I can stretch any further. Can we discuss the possibility of a slight discount?
